name: Evening Entertaiment
description: Evening Entertainment is the perfect app for busy professionals who want to unwind and make the most of their free time after work. With a user-friendly interface and a wide range of features, this app helps you plan and organize your evening activities so you can relax and enjoy yourself without any stress or hassle.
technologies: Javascript / React / CSS / HTML / Axios / APIs

name: Superliga
description: The website is a fun platform where users can guess football scores for upcoming matches and compete with friends. Additionally, it generates a dynamic leaderboard based on users' score predictions. Currently under construction, it promises to be an engaging hub for football enthusiasts seeking interactive gaming experiences

name: Mindfinia
description: Simple application that generates a webpage that displays your team's basic info so you can have quick access to their emails and GitHub profiles. This command-line application has been built using Object-oriented programming (OOP) and Jest for running unit tests, and all tests have been PASSED.

name: Password generator
description: Application where you can use to generate a random password based on criteria youâ€™ve selected. This app run in the browser, and feature dynamically updated HTML and CSS powered by JavaScript code. It have a clean and polished user interface that is responsive, ensuring that it adapts to multiple screen sizes.

name: Weather dashboard
description: This weather dashboard app is to check current weather and 5 day forecast using the OpenWeatherMap APIs.In this App you are able to check weather for multiple cities and retrieve them later from local storage.
technologies: Javascript / CSS / HTML / JQUERY / AJAX, API / Moment.js

name: Work Day Scheduler
description: This calendar app for scheduling your work day was designed to enhance my skills using 3rd party API's. This project used BootStrap and jQuery as well as moment.js to create a Work Day Scheduler.
